summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD FOCUS. WHILE DRIVING AT 70 MPH, THE ENGINE STALLED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN A TO A DEALER. THE TECHNICIAN DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL PUMP ASSEMBLY, FUEL LINE PRESSURE SENSOR, AND THE IGNITION COIL NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 77,500.   UPDATED 7/14/15*CN     UPDATED 10/12/2017*CN
